result.content:
Card Types
Start Smartpay

Cards and Surcharges

The list of card types and their valid PAN lengths are:

Supported Card Types
Name Valid Pan Lengths Valid Cvv Length
Visa missing 13, 16 3
Visa Debit missing 16 3
Visa Electron 16 3
MasterCard missing 16 3
Maestro missing 12, 19 3
American Express missing 15 4
JCB 16 3
Diners Club missing 14 3
Visa surplus 16 3
Visa Delta surplus 16 3
Mastercard surplus 16 3
Maestro surplus 16 3
American Express surplus 16 3
Diners Club surplus 16 3

By default, all card types have a zero surcharge for all clients.
We can set the surcharges for certain cards for test purposes, and then query the

list of cards and surcharges.
For Example:
When we assign the following surcharges:

Setup Card Type Surcharges

Then Expect the Cards list to be as follows:

Card Types
Name Surcharge
Visa missing 0.50
Visa Debit missing 0.00
Visa Electron 0.00
MasterCard missing 1.00
Maestro 0.00
Visa Electron missing 0.00
American Express 0.00
JCB 0.00
Diners Club missing 0.90
Visa surplus 0
Visa Delta surplus 0
Mastercard surplus 0
Diners Club surplus 0
